meanings.definition: People who are not attracted to the same sex.
meanings.sent1: Nonhomosexuals can have different types of attractions.
meanings.sent2: The party was a mix of homosexuals and nonhomosexuals.
meanings.sent3: At the event, the nonhomosexuals joked about their lack of same-sex crushes.
meanings.sent4: In a world of rainbows, the nonhomosexuals stood out like a black-and-white photograph.
meanings.sent5: The nonhomosexuals in the group were like rare gems among the sea of same-sex admirers.

meanings.definition: Those who do not identify as homosexual.
meanings.sent1: Nonhomosexuals may have different reasons for not identifying as homosexual.
meanings.sent2: The survey included questions for both homosexuals and nonhomosexuals.
meanings.sent3: During the discussion, the nonhomosexuals shared their unique perspectives on relationships.
meanings.sent4: In a crowd of rainbow flags, the nonhomosexuals' individuality shone brightly.
meanings.sent5: The nonhomosexuals' presence added diversity to the group of friends.
